data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Jizan, Saudi Arabia to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jizan, Saudi Arabia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Jizan, Saudi Arabia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Jizan, Saudi Arabia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Jizan, Saudi Arabia to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Arab, Tihami people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Jizan, Saudi Arabia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Jizan, Saudi Arabia to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jizan, Saudi Arabia has a population of 105,200.

We estimate Jizan has 557 people who might know Jesus, 3,673 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 100,970 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 188 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Jizan, Saudi Arabia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
